scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace MultipleImagePickerExample.xcworkspace -scheme MultipleImagePickerExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
scripts.pod: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
